namesExpiringSoonBanner.text: Extend them all in one transaction by selecting multiple names and click 'Extend'
namesExpiringSoonBanner.title: One or more names are expiring soon

address.transactionBanner: You are here because of a transaction we sent you or a referral from another site. You have names below that need to be extended soon!

c.cannotclaimDns: You cannot claim names under .{{ name }} on this site.
c.clickToQRCode: Click the QR code to save the page

certificate.warning: SSL certificate for {{ name }}.key is not created yet

addtext.text: Click 'learn more' to read about the process.
addtext.title: Set up a text record in your domain registrar then click refresh. The text record should be called '_ens' and should contain your Ethereum address in the form:

enable.text: Click 'learn more' to read about the process.
enable.title: Visit your domain registrar to enable DNSSEC. Once enabled, click refresh to see if you can move to the next step.

manage.text1: Since you are the owner, you can manage your name now.
manage.text2: Since you are not the owner, you can only view the name in the manager.
manage.title: Congratulations! You have successfully added this DNS domain to the SNS Registry.

proof.text1: The address that appears in the DNS txt record is your same address.
proof.text2: If you know you own this domain, change it's TXT record to contain your Ethereum Address and refresh this page to perform the DNSSEC verification again.
proof.title1: You are the owner of this address. Add your domain to the SNS Registry now.
proof.title2: You don't appear to be the DNS Owner of this domain, but anyone can add this domain to the SNS Registry.

nofavouritesDomains.text: To add names to favourites, click the heart icon next to any desired name.
nofavouritesDomains.title: No names have been saved.

nofavouritesSubdomains.text: To add names to favourites, click the heart icon next to any desired name.
nofavouritesSubdomains.title: No Subdomains have been saved.

howtouse.body: The SNS App is a Graphical User Interface for non-technical users. It allows you to search any name, manage their addresses or resources it points to and create subdomains for each name.
howtouse.title: How to use SNS

whatisens.body: The Ethereum Name Service is a distributed, open, and extensible naming system based on the Ethereum blockchain. SNS eliminates the need to copy or type long addresses.
whatisens.title: What it is

favourite.text: Keep track of domains and subdomains that you own or that you want to follow.
favourite.title: Save favourite names

manage.text: Point domains to your ethereum addresses, transfer ownership to other people and more.
manage.title: Manage names

register.text: Register .eth names for $5/year. Extend your name registration at any time.
register.title: Register names

search.text: Find domains and subdomains that you can register or learn more about.
search.title: Search for names

pricer.gasDescription: Estimated Gas Price (Step 1 + Step 3). The gas price will flucuate.
pricer.pricePerAmount: Price per amount of time selected
pricer.totalDescription: Estimated Total (Price + Gas). The gas price is based at {{gasPriceToGweiFast}} Gwei

buttons.insufficient: Insufficient balance on your wallet. Fill in your wallet and reload the page.
buttons.warning: Click register to move to the 3rd step

register.favourite: * Favorite the name for easy access in case you close out of your browser.
register.increaseRegistrationPeriod: The registration fee will be increased by 50% for every 10,000 new registrations.

premium.dateDescription: Date and time shown in local time zone
premium.title: Premium

premiumWarning.description: To ensure everyone has a fair opportunity to register a newly expired name, these names have a premium that starts at $2,000 and reduces over 28 days until the premium is gone. Enter the amount you're willing to pay as a premium to learn which date to revisit the app to register the name.
premiumWarning.title: This name has a temporary premium.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.text: Need to confirm 1~2 transactions in your wallet, authorize payments in other coins (not Matic coins) and mint NFT for your name.
step1.text2: The process may fail and you can start over.
step1.title: Request to register

step2.label: Step 2
step2.text: The waiting period is required to ensure another person hasn’t tried to register the same name and protect you after your request.
step2.title: Wait for 10-30 second

step3.label: Step 3
step3.text: The registered name is successful when the wallet returns that the transaction has been successful.
step3.title: Complete Registration

titles: Registering a name just requires three steps
You’ll be able to manage your name soon.
You’ve completed the name registration, manage your name now!

registrymigration.donotaccept: *If you trade SNS names, do not accept this name!

messages.controller: This name is controlled by a contract and can't be migrated automatically. Please redeploy your contract to use the new registry before setting the new controller
messages.default: This name needs to be migrated to the new Registry. Only the parent of this name ({{parent}}) can do this.
messages.dnssec: This name needs to be migrated to the new Registry. Please setup the correct DNS Owner and click 'Sync' button below
messages.parentmigrate: You must first migrate the parent domain {{ parent}} before you can migrate this subdomain

renewal.description: Your SNS name is expiring soon, please extend its registration
renewal.title: Extend the registration of your SNS domain {{name}}

domainMalformed.long: You have either added a domain without a TLD such as .eth or you have added unsupported characters.
domainMalformed.short: Domain malformed. {{searchTerm}} is not a valid domain.

tooShort.long: Names less than 6 characters have been reserved for when the permanent registrar has been released.
tooShort.short2: Names must be at least 3 characters long

unsupported.long: We do not support every single domain. Support for future domains are planned in the future
unsupported.short: {{tld}} is not currently a supported TLD.

confirm.subTitle: This action will modify the state of the blockchain.
confirm.title: Are you sure you want to do this?

messages.error: Solve the error in your Domain registrar. Refresh to reflect updates.
messages.outOfSync: The Controller and DNS Owner are out of sync. Click 'sync' to make the DNS Owner the Controller. Click 'refresh' if you make changes to the domain in the DNS Registrar.
messages.readyToRegister: *Click 'refresh' if you make changes to the domain in the DNS Registrar.

singleName.containZeroWidth: This domain contains zeroWidth characters, please recognize! Real domain name:

expiry.cannotown: Extending the registration of a name you do not own does not give you ownership of it.

step1.text: Once you register your name, Go to 'My Account' page and set your Primary SNS Name record. This allows dapps to find and display your SNS name when you connect to them with your Ethereum account.
step1.title: Set your Coin Address record

step2.text: You can set the addresses of many different cryptocurrencies, profile information such as an avatar, Twitter handle, and more
step2.title: Set other records

step3.text: You can host your static html/css/images on IPFS and put the hash in your SNS name's Content record. Then it can be resolved by SNS-aware browsers (e.g. Opera), browser extensions (Metamask), or any browser with '.key' appended to the end (e.g. sns.polygon.key).
step3.title: Set a content hash of a decentralized website

learnmore.title: Learn how to manage your name.

record.cantEdit: You can’t edit or add records until you migrate to the new resolver.

messages.explanation: This designates one of your SNS names to represent your Ethereum account and act as your cross-platform web3 username and profile. You can only have one Primary SNS Name per Ethereum account and can change it at any time.
messages.explanation2: Only SNS names that point to your Ethereum account can be set as your Primary SNS Name.
messages.noForwardRecordAavilable: No SNS names have their ETH Address records set to this address.
messages.notSet: Primary SNS Name (reverse record): not set
messages.reverseRecordRemoval: Are you sure you want to delete your Primary SNS Name record?
messages.selectPlaceholder: Select one of your SNS names
messages.setToDifferent: Primary SNS Name (reverse record): Set to a different name:

record.title: Records

resolver.message: To reset your resolver manually, click set and enter the address of your custom resolver.
resolver.placeholder: Use the Public Resolver or enter the address of your custom resolver contract
resolver.warning: You’re using an outdated version of the public resolver. Click to migrate your resolver and records. You will need to confirm two transactions in order to migrate both your records and resolver.

test.note: Note: .test domain allows anyone to claim an unused name for test purposes, which expires after 28 days

detailsItem.Controller: You can only transfer the controller if you are the controller or registrant and are logged into your wallet
detailsItem.ControllerAndDnsAlreadySync: The controller and DNS owner are already in sync
detailsItem.Resolver: You can only set the resolver on this name if you are the controller and are logged into your wallet
detailsItem.default: You can only make changes if you are the controller and are logged into your wallet
detailsItem.registrant: You can only transfer the registrant if you are the registrant and are logged into your wallet
detailsItem.registrantExpired: You cannot transfer this domain while it is expired. Please extend the registration first.

homoglyph.content: This name contains non-ASCII characters. Please be aware that there are characters that look identical or very similar to English letters, especially characters from Cyrillic and Greek. Also, traditional Chinese characters can look identical or very similar to simplified variants. For more information, please see this
homoglyph.title: ATTENTION

z.transferBusy: Busy trading, please check the status of your transaction in your wallet!!!

registerPageInfo.NeedToPrepare1: 1.Install the metamask wallet plug-in in the browser (recommended: chrome,firefox)
registerPageInfo.NeedToPrepare2: 2.Login to the wallet to ensure that the account balance is sufficient (1-10 maticare required to register a name)
registerPageInfo.RegistrationProcess4: 4.After the connection is successful, a prompt will appear on the page:
registerPageInfo.RegistrationProcess5: 5.Enter the name you want to register, click search, if the following pictureshows, it means the name has been taken:
registerPageInfo.RegistrationProcess6: 6. Ifit is shown as the picture below, it means that the name can be registered:
registerPageInfo.RegistrationProcess7: 7.Click to register, the website will call up the wallet to register (actuallyminting NFT), as shown in the picture below:
registerPageInfo.RegistrationProcess8: 8.After clicking "Confirm" in the wallet, wait for a while, and thefollowing prompt will appear after the transaction is confirmed by the network:
registerPageInfo.RegistrationProcess9: 9. At this point, your name has been successfully registered, and then you can setyour name information or transfer it:
registerPageInfo.Note1: Theregistered name is actually an NFT. You can view the name you own on opensea.This NFT can be resold and you will fully own the registered name.
registerPageInfo.Note2: Onlyone name can be registered for each account. If you need to register more thanone name, you need to prepare multiple addresses.
registerPageInfo.Note3: Whenmodifying the binding information of the name (such as BTC, ETH address), thestate in the contract is changed by initiating a transaction, so the wallet isrequired to initiate the transaction and charge a low gas fee.

errorCode.002: Over the number of free registrations
errorCode.004: The amount sent should be 1 Matic
errorCode.006: The contract does not set the default resolver address
errorCode.007: The name should contain more than 4 characters
errorCode.009: Only the owner can change the parser address
errorCode.011: The receiving address already has a SNS name
errorCode.012: The sending address is not the owner of the name
errorCode.014: The address is not in the list of allowed casting short names

withdrawErrCode.003: send matic to fee collect address fail!
withdrawErrCode.004: gas fee must less than max fee!
withdrawErrCode.005: max fee must more than gas fee!
withdrawErrCode.006: fee collect address is the zero address!

serviceMsg.feedback1: to give feedback on your question.

blockMsg.EstimatedTimeOfAirdrop: Airdrop is expected to begin in mid-March 2022
blockMsg.withdrawTitle: Note: Please don't click withdraw coins repeatedly, otherwise you will lose your commission
blockMsg.withdrawDes1: Withdrawal application has been submitted, you can click
blockMsg.withdrawRuleContent: After the team and community research, in order to prevent the excessive release of tokens from causing dumping pressure and thus affecting the sustainable development of the project. The following withdrawal rules are set:
blockMsg.withdrawRuleContent1: 1. Tokens can be withdrawn per account: up to 10 KEY/week, below 10 KEY can be withdrawn in one cycle.
blockMsg.withdrawRuleContent2: 2. Tokens can be withdrawn in a cumulative system, and can be withdrawn at once after several cycles.
blockMsg.withdrawRuleContent3: 3. A small withdrawal fee will be charged when you click on the token withdrawal request, and the exact amount will be indicated when you initiate the transaction.
